intro: Welcome to bris.tk, the quickest way to check the weather forecast for any place in the world. The forecast is highly accurate.
iframeFail: If the embedded frame above failed, you can visit the page manually with the link below:
feilHead: You seem to be quite off track
feilCont: You have not come to the right place. This page does not exist. In a short while you will be redirected to the front page
contactCont: If you would like to contact us you can do it on any of the adresses below:
goMobile: This is the page where you can add the bris.tk app to your home screen and use it as a native app. Go to your smartphone or tablet to do this.
ATH: Add this page to your home screen and watch the magic happen.
nomob: This website is a website consisting of flash-games. None of these can be played on mobile devices. So please go to your computer to use this page.
mobWarning: To play games, you have to use a computer. However, you can rate, comment and see details for games on your phone
weatherWarning: To be honest, the weather outside is so good that you should consider doing something else than playing flash-games.
noGamesWithTag: There are no games with the tag
noscript: This page relies on javascript. Please enable javascript in your browser if you want to use the website.
cookiePolicy: This website uses cookies to track pageviews and saves data locally to reduce page load time
noInstr: This game does not have any instructions.
gameIsSubmitted: Your game was successfully submitted! Thank you for your contribution to QuickGames!
weatherCredit: Weather forecast from Yr, delivered by the Norwegian Meteorological Institute and NRK
fetchFail: We were unable to fetch weather-data. This may be a temporary error, or your location may not be supported. The issue has been reported and will most likely be resolved soon.
metCredit: Based on weather data from MET Norway
rotateTip: Tip! Turn your device into landscape mode to view more weather data
